name: Site Cleanup
fullHazards: Slips and trips from uneven surfaces or debris. Exposure to airborne silica and dust. Contact with sharp materials.
fullMitigation: Use A5 cut-resistant gloves. Use N95 masks or silica-rated respirators. Wet down dusty areas before sweeping.

name: Ladder Use
fullHazards: Risk of falls from height. Improper ladder use like standing on top rung.
fullMitigation: Use podium or platform ladder. Fall protection over 6 ft on A-frame ladders.
